data.title: Foundation Guesthouse of the University of Basel
data.meta_description:
Warmly welcome to the University of Basel!

The Welcome & Euraxess Center provides assistance to new members and guests of the university. In ...
data.text:
A) Hebelstrasse 90, 4056 Basel with 11 studios

1 room studio

ca. 27m2

10

2 single beds 0.90 x 2m

CHF 1’140-1'200.- per month

2 room studio

ca. 58 m2

1

2 single beds 0.90 x 2m

CHF 1’860.- per month

The pleasant common room on the ground floor has a small garden, both may be used by all guests.

Facilities

The studios feature modern, convenient and easy-to-maintain facilities, including a bath room with shower and toilet, a well-equipped kitchenette, refrigerator, microwave/stove, TV, bed linen, kitchen linen, towels, etc. A communal washing machine and dryer are available in the building as well as an elevator.

Price

The 1 room studios cost from CHF 1'140.- up to CHF 1'200.- and the 2,5 room studio CHF 1'860.- per month, including service charges, wifi and the change of linen every 14 days. Furthermore we charge a onetime fee for the final cleaning; it is based on the size of the studio and costs CHF 120.- up to CHF 150.-.

Location

The property is located in a quiet area. Most university facilities can be reached easily by foot in just 5 to 10 minutes.

B) Herbergsgasse 1, 4051 Basel with 10 studios

1 room studio

ca. 30m2

6

sm double bed 1.40 x 2m

CHF 1’200.- per month

1.5 room studio

ca. 56m2

2

2 single beds 1m x 2m

CHF 1'440.- per month

2 room studio

ca. 54m2

2

2 single beds 1m x 2m

CHF 1'755.- per month

The day nursery of the University of Basel is situated on the ground floor. The small roof terrace may be used by all guests in the evening (used also by the University day nursery during the day).

Facilities

All studios feature modern, convenient and easy-to-maintain facilities, including a bathroom with shower and a well-equipped kitchenette, refrigerator, stove, TV, bed linen, kitchen linen and towels, etc. A washing machine and dryer can be found on the first and third floor.

Price

The 1 room studios cost CHF 1'200.- per month, the big 1 room studios cost CHF 1'440.- per month and the 2 room studios CHF 1'755.- per month, including service charges, wifi and the change of linen every 14 days. Furthermore we charge a onetime fee for the final cleaning; it is based on the size of the studio and costs CHF 120 respectively CHF 130.- up to CHF 150.- for the 2 room studios.

Location

The property is situated in a quiet area in the heart of the old town. Most university facilities can be reached easily by foot in a few minutes.

C) Peter Merian-Strasse 40, 4052 Basel with 3 studios

1 room studio

ca. 27m2

1

sm. double bed 1.40 x 2m

CHF 1'140.- per month

1 room studio with balcony

ca. 27m2

1

sm. double bed 1.40 x 2m

CHF 1'380.- per month

2.5 room studio

ca. 59 m2

1

double bed 1.60 x 2m

CHF 1'950.- per month

The villa is located within a large garden which may be used by all guests.

Facilities

The apartments feature modern, convenient and easy-to-maintain facilities, including a bathroom with shower and toilet, a well-equipped kitchenette, refrigerator, microwave/grill, TV, bed linen, kitchen linen and towels, etc. A communal washing machine and dryer are available in the building.

Price

The small studios cost CHF 1'140.- and CHF 1'380.- CHF per month while the 2,5 room studio is charged CHF 1'950.- per month, including service charges, wifi and the change of linen every 14 days. Furthermore we charge a onetime fee for the final cleaning, it is based on the size of the studio and costs CHF 120.- respectively CHF 150.-.

Location

The property at Peter Merian-Strasse 40 is situated in a beautiful villa with a park, in a quiet area near the Swiss railway station SBB. The city center and many University facilities are in walking distance.

D) Nonnenweg 56, 4055 Basel with 11 studios

1 room studio

ca. 35 m2

6

sm double bed 1.40 x 2m

CHF 1'545.- per month

2 room studio

ca. 51 m2

4

double bed 1.60 x 2m

CHF 1'950.- per month

2 room attic studio*

ca. 43 m2

1

small double bed 1.40 x 2m.

CHF 1'950.- per month

*suitable for wheelchairs

The pleasant common room on the ground floor as well as the garden behind the house may be used by all guests.

Facilities

The apartments feature modern, convenient and easy-to-maintain facilities, including a bathroom with shower and toilet, a well-equipped kitchenette, refrigerator, microwave/grill, TV, bed linen, kitchen linen and towels, etc. A communal washing machine and dryer are available in the building as well as an elevator.

Price

The building and the facilities are new (opened in autumn 2020) which explains the higher price compared to the other guesthouses. The small studios cost CHF 1'545.- per month while the big studios as well as the attic flat are charged CHF 1'950.- per month, including service charges, wifi and the change of linen every 14 days. Furthermore we charge a onetime fee for the final cleaning, it is based on the size of the studio and costs CHF 130.- respectively CHF 150.-.

Location

The property at Nonnenweg 56 is situated in a quiet side street near the University, close to Campus Petersplatz and Biozentrum.
